problem.markdown:
Q. Let p = 17, q = 11 and N = pq. If (in the public-key) e= 7, then a possible value for the trap-door d (in the private-key) in an RAS cryptosystem is
( ) 22 ( ) 153 ( ) 7 ( ) 23
Q. Encrypt the message m = 57 with the textbook RSA with the public key pk = N= 253, e=3
( ) 240 ( ) 250 ( ) 257 ( ) 196
Q. In Asymmetric-Key cipher, the sender uses the _____ key
( ) Private ( ) Public ( ) Either Private or Public ( ) None
problem.p: Q. Let p = 17, q = 11 and N = pq. If (in the public-key) e= 7, then a possible value for the trap-door d (in the private-key) in an RAS cryptosystem is
